data.text: Beli suxuren bata a xinbi sin,46.1 Babilɔn kaane gbee alane nan yi Beli nun Nebo ra.
E bata e felen e bode xɔn,
Yaxuba yixɛtɛne, ɛ tuli mati n na,
N luma na ki kedenna nin
E a tongo e tungunna ma,
Feni ito xa rabira ɛ ma,
Feen naxanye danguxi a fɔlɔ fɔlɔni,
Naxan fama ligadeni a raɲanna ra,
Ɛ tuli mati n xuiin na,
N ma tinxinyaan somatɔɔn ni i ra!
